description: The graph represents a Static Analysis Engine that converts source code across multiple languages into rich, queryable artifacts (symbols, references, class hierarchies, control-flow graphs, and call graphs). The main flow starts with repository scanning and language detection, then uses language-specific project scanners and an LSP client core to extract semantic information, stores results in a centralized results store, and post-processes data into call graphs and clusters with reference resolution and AI-assisted enrichment. The purpose is to provide a complete, language-agnostic pipeline for extracting, organizing, and refining code metadata to support architectural analysis and documentation generation.

components.name: Static Analysis Orchestrator
components.description: Orchestrates the entire static analysis workflow: initiates scanning, determines languages, manages LSP clients, coordinates collection/storage of results, and triggers post-processing.

components.name: Project Scanner
components.description: Scans the repository to detect programming languages, identify file distributions, and establish basic project structure; provides file lists and language proportions.

components.name: Language Configuration Manager
components.description: Maintains language-specific configurations and metadata (file suffixes, LSP command definitions, defaults) and supplies configuration to scanner and LSP client.

components.name: Language Project Scanners
components.description: Parses language-specific build and project configs (e.g., Maven/Gradle, tsconfig/package.json) to supply module structure and bootstrap info for LSP initialization.

components.name: LSP Client Core
components.description: Generic, language-agnostic layer for communicating with Language Servers: manages server lifecycles, request/response patterns, notifications, and extracts semantic code information.

components.name: Static Analysis Results Store
components.description: Central repository for all collected analysis data (CFGs, class hierarchies, package deps, symbols, references); provides query APIs and prepares data for downstream processing/persistence.

components.name: Call Graph & Clustering Engine
components.description: Constructs call graphs and applies clustering algorithms on raw analysis data to group related code entities into logical components for architectural inference and visualization.

components.name: Reference Resolution & AI Assist
components.description: Resolves and disambiguates code references (exact matching, path resolution) and optionally enriches results with AI assistance to improve accuracy and completeness.

components_relations.relation: updates store with generated graphs and clusters
